text: Joseph Anthony Burns was born September 6, 1989 in Herston, Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. He is an Italian ethnicity Australian-Italian cricketer who has played 23 Tests and 6 One Day Internationals for Australia. In 2024, Burns started playing Twenty20 Internationals for Italy and he was made as the captain of the Italian cricket team by the Italy Cricket Board. title: Joe Burns (cricketer)
